Package ohos.bundle

Interface IBundleInstaller

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRemoteBroker

    public interface IBundleInstaller
extends IRemoteBroker
    Installs and uninstalls applications.
    Since:
    1

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int STATUS_INSTALL_FAILURE
      Indicates that the installation fails due to system or service exceptions.
      static int STATUS_INSTALL_FAILURE_ABORTED
      Indicates that the installation is aborted because the user declined to grant permission or the installation session is interrupted.
      static int STATUS_INSTALL_FAILURE_CONFLICT
      Indicates that the installation fails due to an application conflict, for example, an application version with a different signature has been installed.
      static int STATUS_INSTALL_FAILURE_DOWNLOAD_FAILED
      Indicates that the installation fails because the download fails.
      static int STATUS_INSTALL_FAILURE_DOWNLOAD_TIMEOUT
      Indicates that the installation fails because the download is not completed in time.(30 seconds)
      static int STATUS_INSTALL_FAILURE_INCOMPATIBLE
      Indicates that the installation fails due to incompatibility, for example, the in-use Huawei SDK version is not the latest one required or the native code of the application binary interface (ABI) supported by the device is unavailable.
      static int STATUS_INSTALL_FAILURE_INVALID
      Indicates that the installation fails because the bundle format is incorrect, the bundle is damaged, or the signature is incorrect.
      static int STATUS_INSTALL_FAILURE_STORAGE
      Indicates that the installation fails due to storage reasons, for example, insufficient storage space or unavailable storage media.
      static int STATUS_UNINSTALL_FAILURE
      Indicates that the uninstallation fails due to system or service exceptions.
      static int STATUS_UNINSTALL_FAILURE_ABORTED
      Indicates that the uninstallation is aborted.
      static int STATUS_UNINSTALL_FAILURE_BLOCKED
      Indicates that the uninstallation fails because the bundle does not exist, the uninstallation is not allowed by the device, or the user does not have the permission to uninstall the application.
      static int STATUS_UNINSTALL_FAILURE_CONFLICT
      Indicates that the uninstallation fails because the application has a shared library and cannot be uninstalled.
      static int SUCCESS
      Indicates that the application is successfully installed or uninstalled.

      • STATUS_INSTALL_FAILURE_CONFLICT

        static final int STATUS_INSTALL_FAILURE_CONFLICT
        Indicates that the installation fails due to an application conflict, for example, an application version with a different signature has been installed. The user has to uninstall it before installing the new application version.

        The value is 4.

        Since:
        2

    • Method Detail

      • install

        boolean install​(List<String> bundleFilePaths,
                InstallParam installParam,
                InstallerCallback callback)
         throws RemoteException
        Installs an application.

        To use this method, you need to request the ohos.permission.INSTALL_BUNDLE permission from the system, and this permission is of the signature level. The installation is an asynchronous process, and this method does not return the installation result. The result will be carried in the callback method specified by callback.

        Parameters:
        bundleFilePaths - Indicates the path where the bundle of the application is stored. The path should be the relative path to the data directory of the current application.
        installParam - Indicates other parameters required for the installation.
        callback - Indicates the callback method for installing an application, which is used to listen for the installation result.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the application installation procedure is successfully started; returns false otherwise.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Throws this exception if an inter-process calling exception occurs.
        Since:
        1

      • uninstall

        boolean uninstall​(String bundleName,
                  InstallParam installParam,
                  InstallerCallback callback)
           throws RemoteException
        Uninstalls an application.

        To use this method, you need to request the ohos.permission.INSTALL_BUNDLE permission from the system, and this permission is of the signature level.

        You can use a flag to determine whether to keep user data when uninstalling an application.

        Parameters:
        bundleName - Indicates the bundle name of the application to be uninstalled.
        installParam - Indicates other parameters required for the uninstallation.
        callback - Indicates the callback for uninstalling an application, which is used to listen for the uninstallation result.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the application uninstallation procedure is successfully started; returns false otherwise.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Throws this exception if an inter-process calling exception occurs.
        Since:
        1
